title: Diamond Vali - Exquisite Flower Studs
features: Delicate floral design with a cluster setting, maximizing the brilliance of the diamonds. Secure post and friction back closure for comfortable wear. Modern adaptation of classic Vali design.
description: Timeless design, exceptional brilliance, comfortable and secure wear. A versatile piece that transitions seamlessly from day to night. Showcases a modern take on traditional South Indian jewelry aesthetics.
